events.message: We received your application for the software engineer position, and our hiring team is excited to review your background and skills.
Your application has been categorized under the engineering department, specifically targeting software development roles.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your case and will guide you through the next steps of the recruitment process.
The initial screening interview has been completed successfully, where we discussed your experience and motivation for the engineering role.
Thank you for your prompt response and for providing additional information about your recent projects and technical expertise.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for next week, where you will engage with senior engineers to evaluate your coding and problem-solving skills.
